p: To the 1 ml cell suspension (see above) 1ml of ISB containing double the inhibitory concentration of either terpinen-4-ol or geraniol (0.25% and 0.5%, v/v respectively), carbonyl cyanide m-chlorophenylhydrazone (CCCP), a protonophore that inhibits energy production in cells was added to produce a final concentration of 250 Î¼M. The incubation, collection of samples and plate counts were carried out in the same manner as that of the time kill studies in the presence of a carbon source (see above).
